item.title: Torch: AI Health Data Organizer
item.description:
Product Highlights

Tired of digging through three different hospital apps for that blood test from six months ago? Torch stitches your medical fragments into a coherent picture. Connects to thousands of hospitals and labs, lets you toss in PDFs or visit recordings, and AI transcribes and summarizes everything. Best part? It translates medical jargon into plain Englishâ€”just ask ‘How’s my testosterone?’ instead of decoding lab reports. Feels like having a personal medical assistant on standby, finally making sense of your scattered health data.

Pricing Model
